titles.title: Amending the Rules of the House of Representatives to prevent the consideration of any tax measure unless it contains a title simplifying the Internal Revenue Code of 1986.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Rules.

bill.summary: 4/2/2004--Introduced. Amends the Rules of the House of Representatives to prevent the consideration of any tax provision unless the measure containing such provision contains a title simplifying the Internal Revenue Code.
